> some
> fellowship from those on the same journey. Could I be lucky enough
> to find
> you are near???


Local lists

missing Delaware, but i'll get it in there...

messages.subject: Unschooling in SC
messages.msgSnippet: ((Laura)) I would love to know where you are located in SC.  I am in the Myrtle Beach area.  Still looking for like minds in this area.  I read about others on
messages.messageBody:
((Laura))

I would love to know where you are located in SC. I am in the Myrtle Beach
area. Still looking for like minds in this area. I read about others on
this list living near one another and getting together. What fun. It can
be a lonely journey at times. There are days I would really enjoy some
fellowship from those on the same journey. Could I be lucky enough to find
you are near???

~Tracey I. - mom to Rachael (13) & Madison (10)
